item.description:
How Your Values Can Improve Your Business

November 19, 2009, 7:45am
Holiday Inn at Ingleside, Holyoke, MA

$15 with a reservation, $18 at the door

Call (413) 827-4182 by Monday, October 16, for reservations.

Join Susan Solomon for a mini-workshop in which you will see how your values can impact and improve the way you do business. You will observe a live coaching demonstration and learn specific steps you can take to be more fulfilled in both your business and personal life.

Dr. Solomon is known for her lively, entertaining, and interactive instructional style. She is an award-winning consultant, author, former Mayor of Sedona, Arizona, and a Certified Professional Co-active Coach. As a member of the International Coach Federation, she has coached executives, middle managers, faculty, staff, and students, and has conducted numerous trainings and workshops on coaching and communications in both corporate and academic settings. In addition she is an accomplished presenter, having spoken about coaching and conducted coaching workshops at local, regional, and national conferences. She moved to the area less than two years ago and has refocused her coaching practice to coaching women only. She is dedicated to coaching as a way to transform lives.
item.name: How Your Values Can Improve Your Business- November Breakfast Meeting
